title: HALO/Humanitarian Mine Action in Ukraine
description: HALO?s community-centred clearance programme will support vulnerable populations affected by mines and Explosive Remnants of War (ERW) close to the conflict line in Eastern Ukraine. The project will 1) promote physical security in the conflict zone in Ukra ine by removing explosive hazards 2) promote economic and social stability 3) facilitate IDP return 4) facilitate resumption of livelihood activities and 5) infrastructure rehabilitation through mine clearance of residential areas farmland and infrastructu re sites. The primary beneficiaries of the project are the current and returning population in the conflict zone. Project will also support Government of Ukraine to fulfill its obligations under the Anti-Personnel Mine Ban Convention. In addition to curren t funding Finland will fund HALO's project with an additional 600 000 Euros in 2019.
